topics.body:
I'm about to go to the grocery store to grab some caulk(joke intended) and a new air filter, but before I go here's some good science news:
The ozone layer is starting to recover due to lowered emissions and this potentially can massively reduce global warming.  Turns out in this case government regulation is a good thing; I know a lot of people that are anti-regulation are probably typing rapidly here, but sometimes government regulation is a good thing and sometimes it's a bad thing.  In this case government regulations is a good thing cause of the decreased emissions.

Also the first 3D printed car was made; I believe it's called the strati.
!https://lm-shop.s3.amazonaws.com/cache/entry_photo_original/784facd7-b753-4960-8459-6b3339084345/5898f2e8a893cbd7e7c354c4c9c5b8ac.jpg!

topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5415e76163687240343a0000#post_5415e76163687240343a0000
Oooooooh; that explains it, but yeah I highly doubt the anime is going to be good because typically franchises solely centered around harems don't make for good action anime.  If it's a humor based harem sure it can be funny, *but* I have to have serious doubts about a serious action based harem anime.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5415e9a563687255260d0100#post_5415e9a563687255260d0100
Everyday, I see Kantai art flood anime Booru sites in masses. That was basically Touhou's occupation before then. 

Even then, it's still not as well known as a franchise in the west as Touhou is. Many western anime fans still don't even know what Touhou is.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5415e9a563687255260d0100#post_5415e9a563687255260d0100
I have my doubts about Kantai Collection really overtaking Touhou in terms of popularity, admittedly from a perspective of profound ignorance regarding both properties.

My reasoning is simply that Touhou has more diverse cast of interesting characters while Kantai seems to pretty much consist of generically hot anime girls with guns stapled on.
